set(THIS_PROJECT DedicatedLauncher)

project( ${THIS_PROJECT} )

#START-FILE-LIST
# File List auto generated by waf2cmake.py, do not modify manually.

set (SourceGroup_HeaderFiles
	StdAfx.h
	StdAfx.cpp
)
source_group("Header Files" FILES ${SourceGroup_HeaderFiles})


set (SourceGroup_ResourceFiles
	resource.h
)
source_group("Resource Files" FILES ${SourceGroup_ResourceFiles})


set (SourceGroup_SourceFiles
	Main.cpp
)
source_group("Source Files" FILES ${SourceGroup_SourceFiles})


# Support unity build with uber files
set(NoUberFile ${SourceGroup_HeaderFiles} ${SourceGroup_ResourceFiles} ${SourceGroup_SourceFiles}  )


set (SOURCES
	${NoUberFile}
)
#END-FILE-LIST


include_directories( ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} )
include_directories( ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../../CryEngine/CrySystem )

if(NOT WIN32)
	# Exlude files from Build
	set_source_files_properties( Launcher.rc PROPERTIES HEADER_FILE_ONLY TRUE )
endif(NOT WIN32)

add_executable( ${THIS_PROJECT} WIN32 ${SOURCES})

if(WIN32)
	target_link_libraries( ${THIS_PROJECT} Shlwapi )
endif()

SET_PLATFORM_TARGET_PROPERTIES( ${THIS_PROJECT} )
